Text: NDA Cc Greenberg Attached please find a mutual NDA which PetroVantage would prefer to use for the discussions between Wayne Bartel and Bob Schultz on Friday Please review and let me know if you have any concerns or issuesThank you Peter G Scantalides PetroVantage counsel PGS EnronMutualNDAdoc PGS EnronMutualNDAdoc

FW NDA Aspen Technologies Cc to confirm receipt by facsimile of the executed NDA between Enron and PetroVantage We will have it executed by PetroVantage and return it as soon as possible In the meantime if you have any questions or concerns please feel free to contact Bouran Qaddumi of the AspenTech legal department at Thank you Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday April AM To Wayne C Bartel Cc Subject NDA Aspen Technologies At the request of Bob Shults I am attaching our proposed form of NonDisclosure Agreement I am not sure if we have the correct legal name of your company so can you please verify that for me If you have any comments or questions please call Mark Greenberg Senior Counsel at or me at We look forward to hearing from you See attached file aspen technologiesdoc aspen technologiesdoc
